verbs.description: [V: Taking] [ARG1: his turn] [ARGM-LOC: in the batting cage] and swinging a golf club , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] joined a group of famous athletes for a field day with kids at the White House on Wednesday as he kicked off an effort to increase youth participation in sports .
